title: i played a few games of dota because i was bored.here is what i think league does better/wor
body:
ok, so i was bored so i played dota

things league does better

- the new player experience - i ended up doing really badly in those games, and the tutorial taught you stuff but not enough. 
- toxicity - i thought league was really toxic, until i came across dota. everyone gets so angry at each other.
- matchmaking - ok i have 9 hours on dota, and i get placed with someone that has 2k hours. this is probably due to the small playerbase.
- queue times - usually a 5 minute queue (also probably due to the small playerbase)

things dota does better

- the client - you dont need to wait 4 minutes to get into the game after champ select. you basically only have to wait 10 seconds because you don’t have to launch a new client.
- the price of things - all champs are free, and skins can cost as low as 30 cents. (sometimes lower) which is really good.
- skin customization - you can change the head and body and etc. pretty cool.
this took like 20 minutes to type i dont know why it took so long

replies.body: There is a setting in the lol client that makes it not close while in game. If you are on a low spec laptop or pc closing the client while in game greatly increases fps while in game. I assume if it takes your computer 5 minutes to wait for the client to relaunch after a game that you are on a low spec computer? But there is definitely a setting that keeps the client open because i used to have to close client on my old computer.                                     Ive tried dota before aswell i personally didnt like the function of the courier, the feel of walking animations or the use of abilities and what annoyed me the most was how dark and gloomy the map feels.
